subject: Broken plastic piece Clutch
description_text:
Good Day!

Today as i was swapping out the clutch spring the plastic part in the rear just snapped. I didn't apply any pressure to it. The picture of the broken part ist attached.
My order number was #SSN3983

Thanks for your assistance !

Best Regards
Laurin

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurin Gygax,  We will send you a replacement spacer.Â
